category_description: Functional art, hand-blown by skilled glassworkers. Each piece is unique.
category_vibe: Glass with soul—no mass production, just handmade magic.

products.name: Spiral Galaxy Pipe
products.description: A purple-blue swirl that cools smoke as it travels—like holding a galaxy in your palm. The spiral design isn't just beautiful; it creates a longer path for smoother hits.
products.tone_hint: Describe it as a piece of cosmic craftsmanship—both beautiful and practical. Emphasize the artistry of the glassblower.

products.name: Sunset Mesa Bubbler
products.description: Amber and orange hues that capture the moment the sun kisses the desert. The water chamber filters and cools, while the wide base keeps everything stable. A little piece of Southwest magic.
products.tone_hint: Evoke the feeling of desert sunsets and the craft of Southwest artists. This is functional poetry.

products.name: Emerald Forest Spoon
products.description: Deep green glass with subtle gold flecks, like sunlight through old-growth trees. The classic spoon shape fits perfectly in your hand—timeless and reliable.
products.tone_hint: This is an everyday carry with soul. Simple, beautiful, dependable.

products.name: Ocean Wave Sherlock
products.description: Aqua and teal swirls that move like water. The elegant Sherlock shape is a nod to classic pipes, with modern glass artistry. Watching smoke flow through the curves is almost meditative.
products.tone_hint: This is where vintage elegance meets West Coast glass artistry. A collector's piece that's also a daily companion.

products.name: Rainbow Chillum
products.description: Every color of the spectrum in one straight tube. Simple, portable, and surprisingly satisfying. The rainbow shifts as you turn it in the light.
products.tone_hint: Minimalist but joyful. This is the piece you slip in your pocket for adventures.

products.name: Cosmic Bong - Constellation Series
products.description: Deep midnight blue with tiny white dots that form actual constellations—Orion, Big Dipper, Cassiopeia. The percolator diffuses smoke into countless tiny bubbles. Sitting with this feels like stargazing.
products.tone_hint: This is a statement piece—art that happens to function beautifully. For the cosmic dreamer who wants quality.
